.. _commandfile:

Commandfile
***********
This is a completely standard code aster commandfile, nothing special, except
that you can acces parameters of a parametric study like::

    params['parameter']

See :ref:`distributionfile` for more detailed information on how to specify the
parameters and :ref:`profile` for information on how to specify a distributionfile.

An example of an advanced commandfile can be downloaded :download:`here
<../examples/basic/main.comm>`. For much better documented examples see the
`caelinux wiki`_


.. _caelinux wiki: http://www.caelinux.org/wiki/index.php/Doc:Code-Aster
